Both are classic crime dramas that offer a gripping and intense viewing experience, with outstanding performances from the casts. Goodfellas tells the story of Henry Hill, a mobster who becomes an FBI informant, while Scarface explores the rise and fall of Tony Montana, a ruthless drug lord in Miami. Enjoy!

* "Se7en" (1995) - A classic and chilling thriller starring Brad Pitt and Morgan Freeman as detectives investigating a series of gruesome murders. The film's dark atmosphere and twisty plot make it a must-see for fans of the genre.
* "Gone Girl" (2014) - A suspenseful and engaging thriller about a couple whose seemingly perfect marriage turns out to be a facade. With a talented cast including Ben Affleck and Rosamund Pike, this movie will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end.
